query: Recommend to user 76 some movies similar to movie 90.

tool_plan.note: To get the storyline of the movie.
To get the IDs of movies with a description similar to the one of movie 90.
To get a personalized ranking of movies with a description similar to the one of movie 90 for the user.
To get useful information to list the recommended items. 'title', 'genres', and 'description' should be retrieved.

arguments.items: <Python list of item IDs returned by vector_store_search_tool>
